title: Critical insights into eutectic molten hydroxide electrolysis for sustainable green hydrogen production
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01060D, Review Article

Farooq Sher, Imane Ziani, Nawar K. Al-Shara, Alexander Chupin, Nađa Horo, Bohong Wang, Saba Rahman, Bilal Fareed, Monica R. Nemțanu
In addressing global energy demands, the focus on hydrogen gas production from renewable sources intensifies. This research review investigates hydrogen production via steam splitting using eutectic molten hydroxide (NaOH-KOH%) electrolysis,...
